definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
father's elder brother/senior/paternal elder uncle/eldest of brothers/respectful form of address/Count, third of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]
to count/to count as/to regard as/to enumerate (sb's shortcomings)
letter/symbol/character/word/CL:個|个[ge4]/courtesy or style name traditionally given to males aged 20 in dynastic China

sentences.english: Rule 5. A mixed fraction can be expressed in figures unless it is the first word of a sentence.
sentences.chinese: 混合型的分數可以用阿拉伯數字表達除非它位於句首。

sentences.english: Use the number keypad on the remote control to enter the numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在部分電話號碼盤都使用阿拉伯數字。

sentences.english: Only plain Latin letters and Arabic numbers allowed. No other characters will be accepted, including umlauts.
sentences.chinese: 只有普通的拉丁字母和阿拉伯數字允許的。

sentences.english: Most of telephone dials use digital numbers.
sentences.chinese: 在部分電話號碼盤都使用阿拉伯數字。

sentences.english: The same is true for the mapping of Arabic to Roman numerals.
sentences.chinese: 這對於從阿拉伯數字到羅馬數字的映射同樣成立。

definition: pointer on a gauge/clock hand/cursor/(computing) pointer
brass (alloy of copper 銅|铜[tong2] and zinc 鋅|锌[xin1])
variant of 表盤|表盘[biao3 pan2]/watch face
